TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextEndOfParagraph extends System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine

Docs.summary: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The text engine client can use the TextEndOfParagraph class to create a custom paragraph-break representation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 length) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph"> buffer.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph"> class using a specified character length.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 length, class System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties textRunProperties) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph"> buffer.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> value to use for the characters in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph> buffer.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph"> class using a specified character length and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties> value.
